resources.string:
\ Developed as a part of Lane Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering senior design course by Steven White, Shane Welsh, and Peter Kirkpatrick. Graphics, images, and initial app idea provided by Ray Zane.

 This is a small application design to help students plan their commute between campuses. The goal of this app is to give students a way to view the status of the PRT and the bus system while they are in route to/from their classes. This app also features the ability to report the status of the PRT. This is for when the PRT is down, but WVU has yet stated it is down.

This application uses the JTwitter library found at: http://www.winterwell.com/software/jtwitter.php.

 The Flying WV logo and institutional mark is property of West Virginia University.
Submission not accepted. Choose a status and location.
Submission not accepted. Please wait to report again.
Receive notification of PRT status change
